mapper.sql: Id, Question, Answer, SortNo, CreateTime, CreateName, OptTime, OptName, IsDel
mapper.select:
{call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' Id desc ', ' a.* ', ' qa as a ', '
', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
mapper.insert:
insert into qa
Id,
Question,
Answer,
SortNo,
CreateTime,
CreateName,
OptTime,
OptName,
IsDel,

mapper.update:
update qa
Question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SortNo = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update qa set Question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SortNo = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
